channel.title: Court Cam
channel.desc: Tempers flare at the trial of the deadliest biker brawl in U.S. history; the father of a murder victim comes face to face with his daughter's killer; it's a matter of life or death when a defendant goes for a deputy's gun in a packed courtroom.

channel.title: The First 48
